meta.description: Make OCs with unique appearances, personalities and backstories. Create original characters for comics, animations, games, and stories with AI magic.
meta.keywords: OC Maker, Original Character, OC Generator, Orignal Character Generator, AI Character Creator, Anime OC Design, Game Character Maker, AI Character Generator

header.title: OC Maker
header.subtitle: Create your original character (OC) with AI magic - generate unique appearances, personalities, and backstories

characterAppearance.title: Character Appearance
characterAppearance.placeholder: Describe your OC's details (e.g., 'cat girl, blue hair, glasses, shy')

referenceImage.title: Reference Image (Optional)
referenceImage.description: Upload a portrait image to create a character with a similar face

empty.title: Your characters will appear here
empty.description: Describe your character's appearance and click "Generate character" to create your original character

whatIs.title: What is OC Maker
whatIs.description: OC Maker is an AI tool that allows you to design OC with AI magic, where OC is short for Original Character. You can create original characters with unique appearances and personalities.

step1.title: Describe your OC
step1.content: Describe your character's appearance in detail, including facial features, body type, clothing, and accessories

step2.title: Upload a reference
step2.content: Upload a portrait image to create a character with a similar face

step3.title: Generate character
step3.content: Click 'Generate character' to create your original character (OC)

step4.title: Finalize design
step4.content: Select your favorite character and click 'Finalize design' to enter the OC information editing page

example1.desc: Appearance: 1girl, blonde hair, very long curly hair, purple eyes, purple hoodie, black pleated skirt, black socks, black sneakers, black wings, looking at viewer

example2.desc: Appearance: 1boy, blonde hair, short hair, blue eyes, yellow scarf, blue hoodie, zipper, casual clothes, black pants, loafers, black shoes, looking at viewer

example3.desc: Appearance: 1girl, cat ears, green eyes, twin tails, mint hair, long hair, green outfit, leaf motif, thigh-highs, leafy accessory, holding bow, vines, cat tail, genshin impact style

example4.desc: Appearance: 1boy, red and black hair, undercut, glowing eyes, blue eyes, robotic arm, black coat, sword, holding weapon, combat boots, electricity

feature1.title: ‚ú® Professional Quality Results
feature1.content: Create studio-quality character designs without artistic skills - our AI understands composition, lighting, and style consistency.

feature2.title: üé® Unlimited Creative Freedom
feature2.content: Experiment with endless combinations of features, outfits, and styles without constraints - perfect for finding your ideal character design.

feature3.title: ‚ö° Time & Cost Efficient
feature3.content: Generate complete original character designs in seconds instead of hours or days of manual work, saving both time and commissioning costs.

feature4.content: Upload reference images to create characters with similar facial features, ensuring your OC matches your vision perfectly.

howToUse.title: How to Use The OC Maker
howToUse.description: Unleash your creativity with our AI OC Maker and design your original characters with ease. Visualize your OC's appearance, and use it for your stories, animations, games, and more.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What character styles can I create with this OC Maker?
faq.answer1: Our OC Maker supports 50+ styles including anime, manga, comics, fantasy creatures, game characters, and hybrid styles - perfect for storytelling, RPGs, and animations.
faq.question2: Can I animate my created characters?
faq.answer2: Yes! You can use our AI animation tools to bring your characters to life with dynamic movements and expressions. Check out https://komiko.app/image-animation-generator
faq.question3: How detailed can I make my original character?
faq.answer3: Customize 100+ attributes including facial features, body type, clothing textures, accessories, and personality traits through our natural language interface.
faq.question4: What resolution are the output images?
faq.answer4: Characters images are generated at 768px √ó 1152px. You can use KomikoAI's AI Image Upscaler to upscale the image to higher resolution for professional use.
faq.question5: Can I use these characters commercially?
faq.answer5: Yes! You can use your created characters for commercial purposes, including digital and print media.
